marklogic.body:

"ALMOST ALREADY INVADED JAPAN AND HAS 4 OR MORE JAPANESE ALBUMS" then whatÂ do the boybands likeÂ DBSK,Â BigBang,Â and SUJUÂ meaning to you???Â As much as I know, SNSD are not that welcome in Japan compares to KARA though :))Â If all theÂ members are so good with Acting, why yoona's dramas has low rate view even with famous actor???? Lastly to you, Mrs Elaine, more members don't mean anything if they can not collaborate
their dance choreography
